InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.

InstalledItem.Name: GammaMax
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Stealth

A complete overhaul of the materials in the heatsinks dramatically decreased the emission level of the GammaMax. Few medium power plants run as quiet at the same price point of this one from Tyler Design & Tech.

InstalledItem.Name: HeatSink
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

The HeatSink produces low signatures without sacrificing too much performance or durability, making it a reliable stealth component.

InstalledItem.Name: Nova
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RAMP Corporation
Size: 2
Grade: C 
Class: Stealth

Don't draw attention to yourself with the Nova, which is RAMP Corporation’s base, medium-sized stealth quantum drive.

InstalledItem.Name: Sheut
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Ascension Astro
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Stealth

Keep your shield’s heat from giving you away by using a Sheut. Another outstanding stealth shield generator from Ascension Astro.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

InstalledItem.Name: REP-VS EMP Generator
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Burst Generator
Size: 4
Damage Type: EMP

Deliver distortion damage with the REP-VS burst generator built specifically for the Aegis Vanguard Sentinel. Behring modified the technology used in their reputable REP-8 to design an effective non-lethal weapon that integrates seamlessly with the Sentinel.
